review: Is really nice for the most part.  Wish it had an external Wi-Fi antenna.  Drops WI-FI connection ALOT. We use it in the master Bedroom.  Have the Amazon's Fire TV in the Living room, if you have an Ethernet connection nearby I recommend going with the Fire TV instead of the TV STICK.
author: Ken davis

review: This thing is great! And for the women out there who are afraid to buy it because you are technology challenged, not to worry. If I can do it, anyone can do it! The directions are like buying an Apple product...simple, clear, and short. I have had a great time watching things I can't get through cable unless I want to pay more than I already do for TV. You get tons of choices, and they are adding more and more to Netflix and HBOGo, so that can only get better. This is a great product-5 stars for sure!
